import React from 'react' import { Query, Mutation } from 'react-apollo' import gql from 'graphql-tag' import CartStyles from './styles/CartStyles' import Supreme from './styles/Supreme' import CloseButton from './styles/CloseButton' import SickButton from './styles/SickButton' const LOCAL_STATE_QUERY = gql` query { cartOpen @client } ` const Cart = () => ( {({ data }) => console.log(data) || (
× Your Cart

You have __ items in your cart.

$10.10

Checkout
)} ) export default Cart;
